MASKING_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Configure masking settings for sensitive data like email addresses and phone numbers to protect user privacy.
MASKING_SETTINGS.UPDATE_ERROR: There was an error updating masking settings. Please try again.

ENABLE_MASKING.LABEL: Enable data masking
ENABLE_MASKING.HELP_TEXT: When enabled, sensitive data will be masked for users based on their permissions.

PERMISSIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Permissions & Access
PERMISSIONS_SECTION.ADMIN_BYPASS_HELP: Administrators will see unmasked data regardless of other settings.
PERMISSIONS_SECTION.ADMIN_BYPASS_NOTE: Note: By default, all users including administrators see masked data. Enable this option to allow administrators to see unmasked data.
PERMISSIONS_SECTION.EXEMPT_ROLES_HELP: Users with these roles will see unmasked data.
PERMISSIONS_SECTION.ALLOW_REVEAL_LABEL: Allow users to temporarily reveal masked data
PERMISSIONS_SECTION.ALLOW_REVEAL_HELP: Users can click on masked data to temporarily reveal the original value.
